tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Email_Campaign_Performance (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    opens_count INT,
    clicks_count INT,
    conversions_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE email_campaigns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    email_id INT,
    subject_line_id INT,
    action_id INT,
    campaign_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY(email_id) REFERENCES email_content(id),
    FOREIGN KEY(subject_line_id) REFERENCES subject_lines(id),
    FOREIGN KEY(action_id) REFERENCES calls_to_action(id)
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_performance (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    email_campaign_id INT,
    open_rate FLOAT,
    click_rate FLOAT,
    conversion_rate FLOAT,
    revenue DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY(email_campaign_id) REFERENCES email_campaigns(id)
);
